USBD_POWER_ATTR_T_ Struct Reference

Structure used to specify the power attributes of the device. More...

Data Fields

  • IMG_BOOL bSelfPowered
  • IMG_UINT32 ui32MaxPower

Detailed Description

These are used by the driver in building up the enumeration data that will be sent to the host.

Field Documentation

IMG_BOOL USBD_POWER_ATTR_T_::bSelfPowered

Set to 1 if self-powered, 0 if bus-powered

IMG_UINT32 USBD_POWER_ATTR_T_::ui32MaxPower

Maximum current drawn by the device from the usb bus (mA)
